item.title: SWN
item.description: score:4 Chances: Higher oil production and reduction in marketing purchases have positively impacted Southwestern Energy’s Q4 earnings. The longer-term bull case for natural gas rests on expanding U.S. exports, which could benefit companies like Southwestern Energy. Southwestern Energy delivered earnings and revenue surprises for the quarter ended December 2023, indicating potential positive momentum for the stock.
